projects.title: AIChatPoweredEcommerce
projects.description: AIChatPoweredEcommerce mixes AI with e-commerce through a Flask and React-developed platform, embedding a custom AI chatbot for instant customer support. The project underscores my expertise in building secure, responsive, and user-centered online shopping environments. Key technologies include React for the frontend to ensure a dynamic user experience, Python for robust backend operations, and Flask for efficient web server and API management. Notable features include AI-driven chat support using OpenAI's GPT for engaging technical customer interactions, a commitment to secure and responsive design for an optimal shopping experience, and advanced database management with SQLite to guarantee data integrity and swift data access and Postgresql for deployment.

projects.title: Mont Luxe Watch Company
projects.description: The Mont Luxe Watch Company project was an e-commerce platform dedicated to showcasing luxury timepieces. This endeavor was pivotal in my understanding of efficient database management techniques, particularly the significance of separating tables and employing SQL normalization to maintain data integrity, especially when collecting user information in different areas of the application. Utilizing Flask and React, the project served as a comprehensive exercise in full-stack development, where I applied my skills in front-end and back-end development, database management, and API integration. The experience underscored the critical role of structured database design in supporting secure, scalable, and responsive online shopping environments, enhancing my proficiency in creating user-centric web applications.

projects.title: Python CLI Bodyweight Fitness
projects.description: A command-line interface application for generating personalized workout plans, utilizing Python and SQLite3 for data management and application logic. This project highlights my backend proficiency and my interest in fitness technology.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: As a collaborative effort, my team of two developed a web application that harnesses real-time weather data globally via an API key. This project, rooted in Agile methodologies, offers a user-centric design featuring city search functionality, the ability to toggle temperature units, and a system for persistent user comments. Our solution emphasizes seamless user interaction and accurate weather forecasting, making it a go-to platform for weather information.
